verbose_text: Together with previous reports showing that LPA signaling at glutamatergic synapses is mediated by the presynaptic LPA2 receptor and is regulated by the postsynaptic LPA interacting molecule PRG-1 [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], our data describe a novel molecular mechanism regulating glutamatergic transmission at the tripartite glutamatergic synapse.
evidence: LPA signaling at glutamatergic synapses is mediated by the presynaptic LPA2 receptor
